io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi

Class Aurora.PanelLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.rowak.nanoleafapi.Aurora.PanelLayout
  • Enclosing class:
    Aurora

    public class Aurora.PanelLayout
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains methods for accessing and modifying Aurora panel layout information.

      • getNumPanels

        public int getNumPanels(boolean includeRhythm)
                 throws StatusCodeException,
                        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
        Gets the number of panels connected to the Aurora controller.
        Parameters:
        includeRhythm - whether or not to include the Rhythm as a panel (inluded by default in the OpenAPI)
        Returns:
        the number of panels
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException

                  throws StatusCodeException,

      • getPanels

        public Panel[] getPanels()
                  throws StatusCodeException,
                         StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
        Gets an array of the connected panels. Each Panel contains the original position data.
        Returns:
        an array of panels
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException

      • getPanelsRotated

        public Panel[] getPanelsRotated()
                         throws StatusCodeException,
                                StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
        Gets an array of the connected panels that are rotated to match the global orientation. Each Panel contains modified position data.
        Returns:
        an array of rotated panels
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException

      • getPanel

        public Panel getPanel(int id)
               throws StatusCodeException,
                      StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException
        Finds a Panel object if you have a panel id but not the panel object.
        Parameters:
        id - the panel id for the panel
        Returns:
        a Panel with the same id, or null if no panel is found
        Throws:
        StatusCodeException.UnauthorizedException - if the access token is invalid
        StatusCodeException
